output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240017 is present at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Multiple references to Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Has reached between 2000-2999 impressions - Uses public communication style - Discusses matters of national interest (Schengen)
4. Electoral objective: - Portrays Marcel Ciolacu in a very positive light as a successful Prime Minister - Highlights his diplomatic achievements - Shows him as a leader capable of major international negotiations - Times strategically during the election period
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - It's clearly a promotional piece from PSD Dolj - Lacks journalistic objectivity - Contains only positive messaging about the candidate

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Paid advertisement during election period - Clear intent to influence voters by showing candidate's achievements - Posted by party organization (PSD Dolj) - Timing coincides with election period
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1292682541619455) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promoveaza candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU intr-un mod pozitiv, prezentand realizarile sale ca prim-ministru si negocierile pentru aderarea la Schengen. Materialul contine numar CMF (11240017), este platit si distribuit pe Facebook si Instagram, si are un obiectiv electoral clar de a influenta alegatorii in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
